name: beyond the sea (itch) (Keke)
description:
"beyond the sea is a little island made for you and me"

wot's... uh the deal?

dive for fish and trade with your fellow castaways for materials to build up the island

NOTE: volume is set to 0 by default so change it in the settings before you play if you want music

made for ludum dare 48, "deeper and deeper"

controls

wasd or arrow keys to move
left mouse click to talk
right mouse click to dive
r to resurface
esc to pause

credits

programming by Lalaine Ulit-Destajo
art & music by Keke Zhou, Kenney Assets
